documentation.text: @dev Contract for managing creation of new products and handling of the events.
@dev For emiting events whenever product state has been changed.
@dev Creating new product and saving it in storage.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Can't purchase the product, not enough money."

devdoc.details: Contract for managing creation of new products and handling of the events.

createProduct(string,uint256,uint256).details: Creating new product and saving it in storage.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Overriding renounceOwnership function from Wnable contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

triggerDelivery(uint256).details: Shipping the product and emitting an event about it.

triggerPayment(uint256).details: Purchasing the product and emitting an event about it.

withdraw().details: Withdrawing money (deposits for products' purchases) from this contract.
